00031 
00032 Module* Module::createFromLibrary(cstr libraryName)
00033 {
00034     string libName = RDK2::TextUtils::normalizeLibraryName(libraryName);
00035     Module* (*factoryFunction)();
00036 
00037     dlerror();
00038     void* handle = dlopen(libName.c_str(), RTLD_LAZY);
00039     if (!handle) {
00040         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Cannot dlopen() library '%s'; dlerror() = '%s'", libName.c_str(), dlerror());
00041         return 0;
00042     }
00043 
00044     dlerror();
00045     factoryFunction = (Module*(*)())dlsym(handle, MODULE_FACTORY_FUNCTION);
00046     if (!factoryFunction || (long) factoryFunction == -1) {
00047         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Cannot find factory function '%s' in library '%s'; dlerror() = '%s'",
00048             MODULE_FACTORY_FUNCTION, libName.c_str(), dlerror());
00049         return 0;
00050     }
00051     
00052     return (*factoryFunction)();
00053 }

00055 Module::~Module()
00056 {
00057     //RDK_DEBUG_STREAM("Deleting module '" << getModuleName()<< "'");
00058 }
00059 
00060 ModuleConfig Module::createModuleConfig()
00061 {
00062     ModuleConfig cm;
00063     cm.moduleName = moduleName;
00064     cm.library = library;
00065     
00066     //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Creating module configuration for '%s'", moduleName.c_str());
00067 
00068     Repository* repository = session->getRepository();
00069     // FIXME non per nome, ma per sessione!
00070     vector<Url> props = repository->getLocalPropertiesStartingWith(session->getUrlContext()+"/");
00071     for (size_t i = 0; i < props.size(); i++) {
00072         SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00073         Url relativeUrl = props[i].getRelativeUrl(1);
00074         cm.descriptions.insert(make_pair(relativeUrl, session->getPropertyDescription(relativeUrl)));
00075         
00076         //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("%s:", relativeUrl.c_str());
00077         
00078         const PropertyDef& defPd = session->getDefaultPropertyDef(relativeUrl);
00079         const PropertyDef& pd = session->getPropertyDef(relativeUrl);
00080         if (defPd.isPersistent()) {
00081             //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Def: PERSISTENT");
00082             if (pd.isVolatile()) cm.userOptions[relativeUrl].insert("VOLATILE");
00083             if (pd.isKeepThis()) cm.userOptions[relativeUrl].insert("KEEP_THIS");
00084         }
00085         else if (defPd.isKeepThis()) {
00086             //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Def: KEEP_THIS");
00087             if (pd.isVolatile()) cm.userOptions[relativeUrl].insert("VOLATILE");
00088             if (pd.isPersistent()) cm.userOptions[relativeUrl].insert("PERSISTENT");
00089         }
00090         else if (defPd.isVolatile()) {
00091             //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Def: VOLATILE");
00092             if (pd.isPersistent()) cm.userOptions[relativeUrl].insert("PERSISTENT");
00093             if (pd.isKeepThis()) cm.userOptions[relativeUrl].insert("KEEP_THIS");
00094         }
00095 
00096         for (set<string>::iterator it = cm.userOptions[relativeUrl].begin(); it != cm.userOptions[relativeUrl].end(); ++it) {
00097             //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("  %s", it->c_str());
00098         }
00099     
00100         if (pd.isVolatile()) {
00101             if (!pd.isLink()) {
00102                 // it is not a link
00103                 cm.textObjConfigs.insert(make_pair("#" + relativeUrl, ""));
00104                 cm.descriptions[relativeUrl] = "(volatile) " + cm.descriptions[relativeUrl];
00105             }
00106             else {
00107                 // it is a link
00108                 cm.textObjConfigs.insert(make_pair(relativeUrl, "@" + pd.getLinkTo()));
00109             }
00110         }
00111         else if (pd.isPersistent()) {
00112             if (!pd.isLink()) {
00113                 // it is not a link
00114                 RDK2::Object* obj = session->getObjectClone(relativeUrl);
00115                 if (obj) {
00116                     if (obj->hasStringRepresentation()) {
00117                         // NON-NULL OBJECT WITH STRING REPRESENTATION
00118                         cm.textObjConfigs.insert(make_pair(relativeUrl, obj->getStringRepresentation()));
00119                         delete obj;
00120                     }
00121                     else {
00122                         // NON-NULL OBJECT WITHOUT STRING REPRESENTATION
00123                         cm.textObjConfigs.insert(make_pair("#" + relativeUrl, ""));
00124                         cm.objConfigs.push_back(new Pair(relativeUrl, obj));
00125                         cm.descriptions[relativeUrl] = "(see XML) " + cm.descriptions[relativeUrl];
00126                     }
00127                 }
00128                 else {
00129                     // NULL OBJECT
00130                     cm.textObjConfigs.insert(make_pair("#" + relativeUrl, ""));
00131                     cm.descriptions[relativeUrl] = "(NULL) " + cm.descriptions[relativeUrl];
00132                 }
00133             }
00134             else {
00135                 // it is a link
00136                 cm.textObjConfigs.insert(make_pair(relativeUrl, "@" + pd.getLinkTo()));
00137             }
00138         }
00139         else if (pd.isKeepThis()) {
00140             // put in the configuration the old value, regardless of what there is now in the property
00141             bool oldObjectFound = false;
00142             // look for the old object in the old textual configuration
00143             map<string, string>::iterator it = oldConfig.textObjConfigs.find(relativeUrl);
00144             if (it != oldConfig.textObjConfigs.end()) {
00145                 oldObjectFound = true;
00146                 cm.textObjConfigs.insert(make_pair(relativeUrl, it->second));
00147             }
00148             if (!oldObjectFound) {
00149                 // if it was not in the old textual configuration, maybe it is in the xml config
00150                 for (PropertyList::const_iterator it = cm.objConfigs.begin();
00151                 it != cm.objConfigs.end(); ++it) {
00152                     if ((*it)->url == relativeUrl) {
00153                         cm.textObjConfigs.insert(make_pair("#" + relativeUrl, ""));
00154                         cm.objConfigs.push_back(new Pair(relativeUrl, (*it)->value->clone()));
00155                         cm.descriptions[relativeUrl] = "(see XML)" + cm.descriptions[relativeUrl];
00156                         oldObjectFound = true;
00157                         break;
00158                     }
00159                 }
00160             }
00161         }
00162         SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE(session)
00163     }
00164 
00165     return cm;
00166 }
00167 
00168 void Module::initWithModuleConfig(const ModuleConfig& cm, bool configureOnlyPendingProperties)
00169 {
00170     if (!configureOnlyPendingProperties) {
00171         moduleName = cm.moduleName;
00172         library = cm.library;
00173     }
00174     
00175     // options
00176     for (map<string, set<string> >::const_iterator it = cm.userOptions.begin();
00177     it != cm.userOptions.end(); ++it) {
00178         const set<string>& propUserOpts = it->second;
00179         SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00180         string pclass = session->getPropertyDef(it->first).getObjectClassName();
00181         PropertyDef defPd = session->getDefaultPropertyDef(it->first);
00182         // persistence options
00183         if (defPd.isPersistent()) {
00184             //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Is persistent");
00185             if (propUserOpts.find("KEEP_THIS") != propUserOpts.end())
00186                 session->setKeepThis(it->first);
00187             else if (propUserOpts.find("VOLATILE") != propUserOpts.end())
00188                 session->setVolatile(it->first);
00189         }
00190         else if (defPd.isKeepThis()) {
00191             //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Is keep this");
00192             if (propUserOpts.find("PERSISTENT") != propUserOpts.end())
00193                 session->setPersistent(it->first);
00194             else if (propUserOpts.find("VOLATILE") != propUserOpts.end())
00195                 session->setVolatile(it->first);
00196         }
00197         else if (defPd.isVolatile()) {
00198             //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Is volatile");
00199             if (propUserOpts.find("PERSISTENT") != propUserOpts.end()) {
00200                 //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Mananagggaaaaa");
00201                 session->setPersistent(it->first);
00202                 //PropertyDef aapd = session->getPropertyDef(it->first);
00203                 //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("%d", aapd.isPersistent());
00204             }
00205             else if (propUserOpts.find("KEEP_THIS") != propUserOpts.end())
00206                 session->setKeepThis(it->first);
00207         }
00208         // FIXME other options
00209         SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE(session)
00210     }
00211     
00212     // for override message
00213     set<string> xmlConfigured;
00214 
00215     // xml object description configuration
00216     for (PropertyList::const_iterator it = cm.objConfigs.begin();
00217     it != cm.objConfigs.end(); ++it) {
00218         SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00219             cstr url = (*it)->url;
00220             if (!configureOnlyPendingProperties
00221             || pendingConfigurableProperties.find(url) != pendingConfigurableProperties.end()) {
00222                 PropertyDef pd = session->getPropertyDef(url);
00223                 if (pd.isPersistent() || pd.isKeepThis()) {
00224                     RDK2::Object* clone = (*it)->value->clone();
00225                     session->setObject(url, clone);
00226                     xmlConfigured.insert(url);
00227                 }
00228             }
00229             session->end();
00230         SESSION_CATCH(session)
00231             session->terminate();
00232             if (!configureOnlyPendingProperties)
00233                 pendingConfigurableProperties.insert((*it)->url);
00234             else
00235                 RDK_ERROR_PRINTF(e.what());
00236         }
00237     }
00238 
00239     // text configuration
00240     for (map<string, string>::const_iterator it = cm.textObjConfigs.begin();
00241     it != cm.textObjConfigs.end(); ++it) {
00242         SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00243             if (!configureOnlyPendingProperties
00244             || pendingConfigurableProperties.find(it->first) != pendingConfigurableProperties.end()) {
00245                 PropertyDef pd = session->getPropertyDef(it->first);
00246                 if (it->second != "") {
00247                     if (xmlConfigured.find(it->first) != xmlConfigured.end()) {
00248                         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("XML config value for property '%s' has been overriden "
00249                             "by textual config value (this is not an error)", it->first.c_str());
00250                     }
00251                     if (pd.isPersistent() || pd.isKeepThis() || it->second[0] == '@') {
00252                         // FIXME DC: assolutamente da mettere altrove, ad esempio in session
00253                         session->getRepository()->setPropertyValueFromTextConfig(it->first, it->second,
00254                             session->getUrlContext(), session);
00255                     }
00256                 }
00257             }
00258             session->end();
00259             SESSION_CATCH(session)
00260                 session->terminate();
00261                 if (!configureOnlyPendingProperties)
00262                     pendingConfigurableProperties.insert(it->first);
00263                 else
00264                     RDK_ERROR_PRINTF(e.what());
00265             }
00266     }
00267     
00268     if (!configureOnlyPendingProperties)
00269         oldConfig = cm;     // save this initial configuration for later use (e.g. saving KEEP_THIS values)
00270 }
00271 
00272 void Module::start() {
00273     pthread_create(&threadId, 0, (void*(*)(void*)) Module::thread_exec, this);
00274 }
00275 
00276 void* Module::thread_exec(Module* m) {
00277     RDK_DEBUG_STREAM("Starting thread for '" << m->getModuleName() << "' ptr: " << m);
00278     
00279     try {
00280         m->exec();
00281     } catch(SessionException e) {
00282         m->session->terminate();
00283         RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Module '" <<  m->getModuleName() << "' let this exception pass through:");
00284         RDK_ERROR_STREAM(e.what());
00285     } /*catch(std::exception e) {
00286         m->session->terminate();
00287         RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Module '" << m->getModuleName() << "' let this exception pass through:");
00288         RDK_ERROR_STREAM(e.what() << " (this name is mangled!)");
00289     } catch(...) {
00290         m->session->terminate();
00291         RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Module '" << m->getModuleName() << "' let an exception pass through.");
00292     }*/
00293     
00294     RDK_DEBUG_STREAM("Module '" << m->getModuleName() << "' has exited");
00295     return 0;
00296 }
00297 
00298 void Module::requestExit()
00299 {
00300     exiting = true;
00301     session->exiting = true;
00302     qtSession->exiting = true;
00303     asyncSession->exiting = true;
00304     exitRequested();
00305     session->wakeUp();
00306     qtSession->wakeUp();
00307     asyncSession->wakeUp();
00308 }
